sourcesContent:
import { useParams, useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useGetFlightByIdQuery } from "../../redux/api/flightApi"; import Header from "../Header"; import Footer from "../Footer"; export default function FlightDetail() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { id } = useParams(); const location = useLocation(); const query = new URLSearchParams(location.search); const from = query.get("from"); const to = query.get("to"); const pax = query.get("pax"); const travelDate = query.get("date"); const travelTime = query.get("time"); const { data, error, isLoading } = useGetFlightByIdQuery({ id, from, to, pax, }); if (isLoading) return
Loading...
; if (error) return
Error loading flight details
; const flight = data?.flight; const fromAirport = data?.fromAirport; const toAirport = data?.toAirport; if (!flight) return
Flight not found
; // ✅ Calculate total price using priceHeads (like in Results.jsx) const basePrice = (flight.priceHeads || []).reduce( (sum, head) => sum + (Number(head.amount) || 0), 0 ); const taxesAndFees = Math.round(basePrice * 0.12); const grandTotal = basePrice + taxesAndFees; const handleEnquiryClick = () => { const bookingParams = `?flightId=${id}&from=${from}&to=${to}&pax=${pax}&date=${travelDate}&time=${travelTime}`; const isLoggedIn = localStorage.getItem("token"); if (isLoggedIn) { navigate(`/enquiry${bookingParams}`); } else { navigate(`/login${bookingParams}`); } }; return ( <>

Flight Details

{/* ====== Left Section ====== */}

{flight.name}

  • {travelDate}
  • {travelTime}
  • {pax} Passengers
Speed

{flight.maxSpeed} km/hr

Passengers

{flight.capacity} Person

Travel Time

{flight.travelTime} min

Luggage

{flight.baggage || "N/A"} kg

Mandatory Guidelines for all travellers

Please arrive 30 minutes before departure. Carry a valid government ID. Ensure baggage does not exceed allowed limit.

{/* ====== Right Section ====== */}

Ride Details

{fromAirport?.name} - {toAirport?.name}

location_on

{fromAirport?.name}, {fromAirport?.city},{" "} {fromAirport?.country}

location_on

{toAirport?.name}, {toAirport?.city},{" "} {toAirport?.country}

Distance

location_on

Total Distance: {flight.distance} KM

schedule

Total Duration:{" "} {Math.floor(flight.travelTime / 60)} hr{" "} {flight.travelTime % 60} min

{/* ✅ Dynamic Bill Section */}

Bill Details

{/* Show all price heads */} {flight.priceHeads?.length ? ( flight.priceHeads.map((head, index) => (
{head.name}
currency_rupee {" "} {Number(head.amount).toLocaleString()}
)) ) : (

No price breakdown available.

)}
Taxes & Fees (12%)
currency_rupee {" "} {taxesAndFees.toLocaleString()}
Grand Total
currency_rupee {" "} {grandTotal.toLocaleString()}
); }
